DataExport.CsvEmptyMessage: No data to export for the given date
DataExport.BackupPathDescription: Change the default backup folder path. Defaults to: MATOMO_ROOT/tmp/de_backups
DataExport.AutoDumpIntro: Run automatic database dumps to keep your data safe.
DataExport.AutoDumpDescription: Generate a database dump automatically. Choose the frequency of the dump.
DataExport.SyncOption: Choose how to sync the backup files
DataExport.SyncOptionDesc: Choose the option to sync the backup files to an external server.
DataExport.SyncFileExternalDesc: Sync the backup files to an external server using SFTP or S3.
DataExport.SyncFilePathDesc: Path on remote server where the backup files will be synced.
DataExport.SyncBucketName: Sync Bucket Name for S3 or HOST for SFTP
DataExport.SyncBucketNameDesc: Name of the bucket where the backup files will be synced. Or HOST for SFTP.
DataExport.SyncKey: Sync Key for S3 or USER for SFTP
DataExport.SyncKeyDesc: Name of the key used to sync the backup files. Use USER for SFTP.
DataExport.SyncSecretDesc: Secret for S3 or Password for SFTP. **Warning:** This secret will be stored in the config file visible to everybody who can access it.
DataExport.SyncRegionDesc: Sync Region for S3. Only required for S3.
DataExport.SyncCompressionDesc: Select the compression type for the backup files.
